dataset_info.title: TELOS Adversarial Validation Dataset
dataset_info.description: Validation results for TELOS AI governance framework across standardized harm prevention benchmarks.

confidence_interval.interpretation: 99.9% confidence that true attack success rate is between 0% and 0.28%

statistical_significance.interpretation: Highly statistically significant harm prevention performance

HarmBench.note: Individual attack forensics not stored; aggregate metrics only

tier_1.name: Primacy Attractor (PA)
tier_1.method: Mathematical enforcement via cosine similarity to HIPAA compliance embedding
tier_1.purpose: Autonomous harm prevention without human intervention

tier_2.name: RAG Corpus
tier_2.method: Policy consultation with authoritative healthcare guidelines
tier_2.sources: HIPAA Privacy Rule, FDA regulations, AMA ethics guidelines

tier_3.name: Human Expert
tier_3.method: Escalation to qualified healthcare compliance expert
tier_3.trigger: Fidelity score < Tier 1 threshold AND high uncertainty
tier_3.purpose: Final arbiter for complex edge cases

six_sigma_analysis.interpretation: Tier 3 escalation rate of 1.2% demonstrates high automation with minimal human intervention

medsafetybench_validation_results.json.format: Detailed results with prompts, fidelity scores, tier assignments, timestamps

harmbench_validation_results_summary.jso.format: Aggregate summary with tier distribution (individual records not preserved)

reproducibility.embedding_generation_overhead: ~0.8-1.1s per attack for Ollama API calls

limitations_and_future_work.telemetric_signatures: Cryptographic audit trail implementation is pending. Current version does not include unforgeable signatures.
limitations_and_future_work.pii_bench_validation: PII-Bench tests were generated but used template placeholders instead of real PII data. These results are excluded from this dataset pending proper implementation.
limitations_and_future_work.penetration_testing: Cryptographic penetration testing (signature forgery, key extraction) not yet conducted as cryptographic system is not implemented.
limitations_and_future_work.agentharm_data: AgentHarm validation was initiated but detailed results were not preserved. Excluded from this dataset.
future_plans: Implement TelemetricSignatureMVP class for real cryptographic signatures
Conduct PII-Bench validation with actual PII data
Execute cryptographic penetration testing once signatures are implemented
Complete AgentHarm validation with full forensic recording

citation.apa: Brunner, J. (2025). TELOS Adversarial Validation Dataset (Version 1.0) [Data set]. Zenodo. https://doi.org/10.5281/zenodo.17702890
